intro: Dumoria africana, commonly known as African dumoria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes a wide variety of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that typically bloom in shades of white and pink. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a rough, textured surface. Dumoria africana is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and along riverbanks.
